home.subTitle: Proporcionar a los pacientes las terapias más avanzadas y efectivas, nada más.
home.aboutText: En ARC, entendemos de primera mano el poder transformador de las terapias. Cada miembro de nuestro equipo tiene una conexión personal con alguien que ha sido ayudado por estos tratamientos innovadores, razón por la cual nos apasiona llevar sus beneficios a la mayor cantidad de personas posible.
home.firstStepText: El primer paso es agendar una evaluación
home.firstStepText2: con nuestros médicos profesionales, puede ser en persona
home.secondStepText: Nuestros profesionales preguntarán por tu historial
home.secondStepText3: y terapias probadas, esto para encontrar
home.secondStepText4: la terapia medica indicada para ti.
home.thirdStepText: Si decides seguir adelante en el proceso,
home.thirdStepText2: es probable que necesitemos una o más
home.fourthStepText: El día de tu tratamiento tendremos
home.fourthStepText2: todo listo para darte la mejor
home.trustUs: Confía en nosotros para ayudarte a obtener una salud y bienestar óptimos a través del poder de las terapias. Contáctenos hoy para obtener más información sobre nuestros servicios y programar una consulta con uno de nuestros profesionales médicos expertos.

aboutUs.medicDescription: A Mexican national, is an accomplished physician and a proud alumnus of the Universidad Autónoma of Nuevo León, one of Mexico’s top-five ranked medical institutions. Since his graduation in 2014, Dr. Hernández has enjoyed a diversified medical career, exploring fields including general practice, emergency medicine, aesthetic medicine, and eventually finding his true passion in regenerative medicine.

services.subTitle: The list of certified doctors with years of
services.wellnessDrip: Provide the body with a boost of essential nutrients, potentially enhancing overall well-being and addressing specific health concerns.
services.sunkissedGlow: Warm and radiant tan or complexion achieved through the use of sunless tanning products.
services.recoveryDrip: This therapy support the body's recovery after physical exertion, dehydration, or other conditions that may contribute to nutrient depletion.
services.fitnessDrip: This therapy support for individuals engaged in fitness activities, with the goal of enhancing performance, reducing fatigue, and promoting overall recovery.
services.cmergenC: Strengthen the immune system and in the prevention and/or treatment of colds and flu.
services.fatBurn: Treatment aimed at promoting fat loss or enhancing the body's ability to burn fat.
services.beautyBlend: Promote radiant skin, a youthful complexion, and a sense of well-being.
services.MasterAntioxidant: Combines multiple potent antioxidants to promote skin health and combat oxidative stress.
services.antiPain: Blend of various therapeutic modalities or medications aimed at effectively alleviating pain.
services.energyShot: Provide a rapid increase in alertness and energy levels, often without the calories and volume of a regular energy drink.
services.dShot: Therapy where medications or nutrients are administered via intramuscular or subcutaneous injections. This could include therapies such as vitamin injections, nutrient infusions, or medical injections for specific health conditions.
services.skinnyShot: Blend of vitamins, minerals, and amino acids that is supplement to aid weight loss and boost metabolism.
services.addOns: Incorporating additional substances or nutrients into intravenous (IV) therapy sessions beyond the standard components.
services.oncologyMedications: These medications play a crucial role in various aspects of cancer care, including inhibiting the growth and spread of cancer cells, alleviating symptoms, and improving overall survival rates.
services.rheumatology: Rheumatology is a medical specialty that focuses on the diagnosis and treatment of rheumatic diseases, which are conditions affecting the joints, muscles, bones, and connective tissues.
services.botox: Reduce the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines.
services.facialFilling: Cosmetic products injected beneath the skin's surface to restore volume, smooth wrinkles, and enhance facial contours.
services.tensioningWires: Tensioning wires might be used to facilitate tissue approximation, closure, or fixation in areas other than bones.
services.mesotherapy: Cosmetic and medical procedure that involves the injection of a mixture of pharmaceutical and homeopathic medications, vitamins, enzymes, hormones, and other substances directly into the skin's middle layer (mesoderm).
services.apparatusology: Equipment aimed at losing weight and toning that has had the most success in recent years.
services.internalMedicine: Medical specialty that focuses on the prevention, diagnosis, and non-surgical treatment of adult diseases.
services.traumatology: Medical specialty that focuses on the diagnosis, treatment, and management of injuries, especially those resulting from physical trauma, accidents, and emergencies.
services.physiotherapy: Healthcare profession focused on optimizing physical function, movement, and overall well-being.
services.neurotherapy: Therapeutic approach that involves real-time monitoring of brain activity to help individuals regulate and optimize their neural function.
services.generalLaboratories: Facilities equipped to perform a wide range of diagnostic tests and analyses on various biological samples.
services.wellnessDripDescription: A wellness drip, also known as an intravenous (IV) drip or infusion, is a therapy where a combination of vitamins, minerals, antioxidants, and sometimes medications is delivered directly into the bloodstream through an IV line. These drips are often customized based on individual needs and wellness goals. Wellness drips are purported to provide hydration, replenish nutrients, boost energy levels, support immune function, and promote overall well-being. Common ingredients found in wellness drips include vitamin C, B vitamins, magnesium, calcium, and amino acids.
services.wellnessDripBenefits: Hydration: IV hydration can quickly replenish fluids in the body, which is especially beneficial for individuals who are dehydrated due to illness, intense physical activity, or environmental factors.
services.wellnessDripBenefits2: Nutrient Replenishment: Wellness drips often contain a blend of vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants that may help replenish nutrients that the body may be lacking. This can be particularly useful for individuals with nutrient deficiencies or those with busy lifestyles who may not get adequate nutrition from their diet alone.
services.wellnessDripBenefits3: Boosted Immune Function: Certain vitamins and minerals found in wellness drips, such as vitamin C and zinc, are believed to support immune function. Receiving these nutrients intravenously may provide a quicker and more potent immune boost compared to oral supplementation.
services.wellnessDripBenefits4: Increased Energy Levels: Some people report feeling more energized and revitalized after receiving a wellness drip, especially if it contains ingredients like B vitamins, which are known to play a role in energy metabolism.
services.wellnessDripBenefits5: Hangover Relief: Wellness drips are often marketed as a quick remedy for hangovers, as they can help rehydrate the body and replenish electrolytes lost due to excessive alcohol consumption.
services.sunkissedGlowDescription: Warm and radiant tan or complexion achieved through the use of sunless tanning products.
services.sunkissedGlowBenefits: Healthy Appearance: A sunkissed glow can give the appearance of healthy, well-nourished skin. It can make the skin look vibrant, youthful, and refreshed.
services.sunkissedGlowBenefits2: Boosted Confidence: Achieving a sunkissed glow can boost confidence and self-esteem. Many people feel more attractive and radiant with a bronzed complexion, which can positively impact their overall mood and perception of themselves.
services.sunkissedGlowBenefits3: Enhanced Features: The warm tones of a sunkissed glow can help enhance facial features by adding depth and dimension. Bronzer and highlighter can be used strategically to contour the face and accentuate cheekbones, jawlines, and other features.
services.sunkissedGlowBenefits4: Youthful Appearance: A sunkissed glow is often associated with youthfulness and vitality. It can help minimize the appearance of imperfections such as blemishes, redness, or uneven skin tone, giving the skin a smoother and more even texture.
services.sunkissedGlowBenefits5: Versatility: The sunkissed glow look is versatile and can be adapted to various skin tones and makeup styles. Whether it's a subtle glow or a more intense bronzed effect, individuals can customize the look to suit their preferences and occasions.

faqs.firstQuestion: ¿A qué edad está indicado iniciar tratamientos estéticos?
faqs.firstAnswer: Como tratamiento preventivo, no existe una edad específica. El inicio lo marca el tipo de piel, a partir de los 20 años las cremas son suficientes y algunos tratamientos se pueden aplicar como preventivos o con fines anti-envejecimiento.
faqs.secondQuestion: ¿Cuál es la diferencia entre Botox y rellenos?
faqs.secondAnswer: Ambos son tratamientos para eliminar las arrugas, pero el Botox las elimina relajando los músculos, mientras que los rellenos las eliminan dando volumen mediante un gel natural (Generalmente Hyaluronic Ac.).
faqs.thirdAnswer: Prácticamente todos los tratamientos se realizan con terapia de frío local y las molestias son mínimas. Pero si el paciente lo solicita se puede utilizar anestesia.
faqs.fourthQuestion: ¿Qué es la sueroterapia y cuál es su objetivo?
faqs.fourthAnswer: Consiste en administrar por vía intravenosa sueros específicos que favorecen la autocuración y el buen funcionamiento de nuestro organismo a partir de una selección de vitaminas, minerales, oligoelementos y fármacos biológicos naturales según las necesidades específicas de cada persona y sin utilizar conservantes artificiales.
faqs.fifthAnswer: Cualquier persona puede utilizar la sueroterapia, pacientes con enfermedades degenerativas agudas o crónicas, en estados de convalecencia tras una enfermedad u operación, personas con una alta carga de trabajo y/o estrés, personas con obesidad o deportistas o simplemente personas sanas que buscan prevenir enfermedades y optimizar el estado físico y rendimiento intelectual.
faqs.sixthQuestion: ¿Cuánto tiempo se tarda en ver sus efectos en el organismo?
faqs.sixthAnswer: Sus efectos terapéuticos son rápidos, permitiendo restablecer las funciones normales de los órganos, y acelerando la recuperación biológica de los pacientes, recuperando la vitalidad, frenando el deterioro orgánico y comenzando a vivir una vida más plena. Cuanto antes inicies este tipo de tratamiento mejores serán los resultados, previniendo la degeneración celular y el daño del ADN.
faqs.seventhAnswer: La terapia de infusión implica la administración de medicamentos a través de una aguja o cateterismo. Generalmente se prescribe cuando la condición de un paciente no puede tratarse con medicamentos orales.
faqs.eigthQuestion: ¿Cuáles son los tipos de terapias de infusión?
faqs.eightAnswer: Contamos con planes de tratamiento que se pueden administrar a pacientes de todas las edades para tratar y controlar una variedad de afecciones. La terapia de infusión puede tratar problemas infecciosos, trastornos autoinmunes, trastornos nutricionales o gastrointestinales, cáncer y problemas hematológicos, deficiencias inmunitarias, hemofilia y puede incluir pacientes que controlan síntomas de enfermedades avanzadas.
faqs.nineQuestion: ¿La terapia de infusión está cubierta por el seguro médico?
faqs.nineAnswer: Depende del servicio que se necesite pero casi la mayoría están cubiertos por un seguro médico (Previa autorización de la aseguradora).
